## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[runDirectly(input, opts)](./flow.flow.rundirectly.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Executes the flow with the input directly.

This will either be called by runEnvelope when starting durable flows, or it will be called directly when starting non-durable flows.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[runEnvelope(req, streamingCallback, auth)](./flow.flow.runenvelope.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Executes the flow with the input in the envelope format.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
